forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun peeks over the horizon, the day in Downtown San Francisco promises a gentle warmth after the cool embrace of morning fog. Currently, a serene clarity bathes the city, punctuated by soft stretches of blue sky and the lingering whispers of yesterday's marine layer retreating to the fringes. The air is brisk with a refreshing wind that adds a lively rhythm to the atmosphere, hinting at the playful gusts that will soon pick up, inviting a sense of adventure into the day.

As the sun climbs, temperatures will hover near a comfortable 70 degrees, dipping slightly in the afternoon as the coastal breeze sweeps in once more. Tonight, clouds will gather, wrapping the city in a cozy blanket as the low settles around 59. For the discerning wanderer, a light jacket will serve well against the evening chill, while layers during the day can offer the perfect juxtaposition of warmth and comfort. Given the splendid weather, a leisurely stroll through one of the city’s scenic parks or a relaxed café visit would be delightful—allowing one to savor the transition from vibrant sunlit warmth to the tranquil embrace of dusk.
